description: This file declares utility functions for handling PKCS12 encoding/decoding, cryptographic operations such as hashing, encryption, decryption, key derivation, and related cryptographic utilities. It is part of a PKCS12 library implementation and includes function prototypes for internal PKCS12 handling processes.

methods.name: PKCS12UtilityRemove
methods.description: Memory free function for removing or deallocating PKCS12 utility context.

methods.name: PKCS12UtilityPasswordToBMPString
methods.description: Converts a password string to a BMP string format suitable for cryptographic processing.

methods.name: PKCS12UtilityConcatenateString
methods.description: Concatenates two byte buffers and returns the combined buffer with caller responsible for release.

methods.name: PKCS12UtilityHashString
methods.description: Hashes a message using specified hashing type and iteration count.

methods.name: PKCS12UtilityConcatenateAndHash
methods.description: Concatenates two messages and hashes the result with specified parameters.

methods.name: PKCS12UtilityGetDerivedKey
methods.description: Derives a cryptographic key from password and salt using specified parameters.

methods.name: PKCS12UtilityGetPKCS5DerivedKey
methods.description: Derives a key according to PKCS5 standard from password and salt.

methods.name: PKCS12UtilityDecrypt
methods.description: Decrypts encrypted data using specified cryptographic algorithm and parameters.

methods.name: PKCS12UtilityEncrypt
methods.description: Encrypts data with specified cryptographic algorithm and parameters.

methods.name: PKCS12UtilityGetHMAC
methods.description: Computes HMAC for a message with specified hash type and password.

methods.name: PKCS12UtilityRC2CBC
methods.description: Performs RC2 cipher encryption/decryption in CBC mode.
